promos.blocktitle: For The Outdoor Dad Who Enjoys A Good Campfire
promos.title: TROY-BILT® TB4216 16" GAS CHAINSAW
promos.copy: The Troy-Bilt® TB4216 16" Gas Chainsaw with SpringAssist™ technology offers easier pull starts, a low-kickback bar and lightweight design to cut through limbs fast, making it one of the best types of saws to cut trees and clean up the yard.

promos.blocktitle: For The Papa Who Loves A Clean Outdoor Space
promos.title: TB430 LEAF BLOWER
promos.copy: The TB430 Gas Leaf Blower offers the convenience and power you desire. This Leaf Blower is equipped with SpringAssist™ technology for easier pull starts as well as simple, reliable starting with Prime, Flip & Go™ starting system.

promos.blocktitle: For The Father Who Knows Homegrown Vegetables Are The Best
promos.title: COLT FT GARDEN TILLER
promos.copy: Front tines, that slice, chop and turn to create finely tilled soil, ready for planting. Depth stake allows you to customize tilling depth up to 7-inches.

promos.blocktitle: A Great Tool For Jobs Needing An Extra-Long Reach
promos.title: TB25PS POLE SAW
promos.copy: Features a 25cc, 2-cycle engine with SpringAssist™ starting. Includes an 8" low kickback bar and chain to cut through limbs fast and a 7-foot extension pole with a removable 26" section that allows the user to reach up to 12’ (dependent on the operator’s height).

promos.blocktitle: Two Tools In One For Practical Dads
promos.title: TB25CE TRIMMER/EDGER COMBO
promos.copy: Includes a curved shaft string trimmer with an easy Prime, Flip & Go™ starting system, plus a steel blade edger attachment designed to trim around driveways, sidewalks, and landscape beds.

promos.blocktitle: Take On More Tasks. Take Up Less Space
promos.title: TRIMMERPLUS ATTACHMENTS
promos.copy: Turn any attachment-capable string trimmer into a variety of lawn care products with affordable TrimmerPlus attachments.

promos.title: TB110 PUSH LAWN MOWER
promos.copy: Lightweight and dependable and comes with everything needed to mulch or bag clippings. This makes it a great place to start when choosing a gift for a new homeowner.

promos.blocktitle: For That Special Someone Who’s Fresh Into Gardening
promos.title: TB225 GARDEN CULTIVATOR
promos.copy: Cultivators make quick work of prepping soil and weeding between plants in existing beds throughout the season

promos.title: TROY-BILT FINANCING
promos.copy: The Troy-Bilt credit card allows you to shop for new Troy-Bilt equipment, parts and accessories with Special Financing.
